Title: Source 1b. Seasonal Changes
Content: ğ—™ğ—œğ—šğ—¨ğ—¥ğ—˜ ğŸ® shows how the amount of algae in the ocean changes from January to June. The arrows show where sunlight is more direct during each season. Areas where the sunlight is more direct receive more sunlight. In January, the sunlight is more direct in the Southern Hemisphere. In June, the sunlight is more direct in the Northern Hemisphere.
